title: BCG vaccination assessment form
cleaned_text: Babies or children less than five years of age are eligible for BCG vaccination if they meet the following criteria: - they will be living in a house or family/whnau with a person with either current TB or a history of TB - they have one or both parents or household members or carers who, within the last 5 years, lived for a period of 6 months or longer in [countries with a TB rate 40 per 100,000](https://www.health.govt.nz/our-work/immunisation-handbook-2020/appendix-8-high-incidence-tb-countries#tablea8-1) - during their first 5 years they will be living for 3 months or longer in a country with a TB rate 40 per 100,000.
